name: Digging For Harambe's Tears
description:
In this Motherload-inspired fan-based parody, you must dig *deeper and deeper* to find the rarest treasure of all. (And it isn't the power of friendship)

Objective: Keep yourself fueled by obtaining ores and selling them to the processor.

Press 'E' To open the shops when you are near them.

Press 'Tab' to view your inventory.

Standard WASD / UpDownLeftRight controls (UP/W is to fly). You can dig Horizontally and down (it's okay to dig straight down in our game...we swear).

This is completely bug-free and anything you encounter that you deem is odd is a user-error.

Not really. It's just in Beta! 

Cheers
